channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Guerre des étoiles « made in France », épisode III : Yoda le gardien des orbites
item.description: Serons-nous bientôt capables de nous défendre en orbite ? Face aux étranges manœuvres russes en orbite, la France se prépare à assurer sa défense et lance plusieurs missions de démonstration technologique. Ultime étape avant d’être pleinement opérationnels.

item.title: I've used nearly every MacBook to date - here are today's best Black Friday deals from $599
item.description: Apple is running some unmissable deals on the MacBook Pro and MacBook Air - find them here.

item.title: Some of the best Nintendo Switch games are up to $30 off for Black Friday
item.description: Nintendo has made some of the most iconic video games of all time, but building a library of the standouts can quickly become expensive, especially given that many titles don’t often go on sale at a significant discount. The good news is that Nintendo is already running a holiday sale in the run-up to Black […]

item.title: I can finally relax! The app that took the stress out of my Secret Santa experience
item.description: Homescreen Heroes: Elfster is the essential app for organizing your gift exchange

item.title: X’s messy About This Account rollout has caused utter chaos
item.description: Yesterday X started rolling out a new About This Account feature, which included what country the account was created from and what country the account is “based” in (which is different from “connected via”). Head of product at X, Nikita Bier, was quick to say that there were “a few rough edges,” but promised they’d […]

item.title: QD-OLED, 240 Hz, 0,03 ms : cet écran PC MSI perd 32 % de son prix pour la Black Friday Week
item.description: En cette Black Friday Week, les gamers au budget serré n'ont évidemment pas été oubliés. L'un des écrans ultimes pour les joueurs pointilleux en quête de réactivité, le MSI MAG 321UPX, est actuellement proposé à 649,99 euros au lieu de 949,54 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: DJI's first 360-degree drone leaks again – and an official launch could be very soon
item.description: The DJI Avatar 360 has been granted regulatory approval in the US, but time is running out ahead of a ban.

item.title: The highly-rated DJI Osmo Action 5 Pro plummets to a record-low price for Black Friday
item.description: This jam-packed DJI Osmo Action 5 Pro bundle drops to $259 on Amazon for Black Friday.

item.title: Game anywhere with $250 off the Lenovo Legion Go S ahead of Black Friday
item.description: As of Nov. 23, get $250 off the Lenovo Legion Go S at Best Buy ahead of Black Friday.

item.title: La sélection des smartphones avec la meilleure autonomie en 2025 : notre comparatif complet
item.description: L'endurance de la batterie est un critère primordial lors de l'achat d'un smartphone. Pour vous aider à choisir le smartphone avec la meilleure autonomie, nous avons testé les modèles actuels et établi une sélection précise. C'est parti !

item.title: 5 essential Black Friday deals for fitness-conscious over 50s – from massage guns to fitness trackers
item.description: I'm a fitness writer: here are 5 products I recommend for over-50s, and they're all on sale for Black Friday.

item.title: AI is too risky to insure, say people whose job is insuring risk
item.description: Major insurers including AIG, Great American, and WR Berkley are asking U.S. regulators for permission to exclude AI-related liabilities from corporate policies. One underwriter describes the AI models’ outputs to the FT as "too much of a black box."

item.title: New X Feature Reveals Many MAGA Patriots on X Are Not Even Based in The U.S.
item.description: Users are able to spot the deceit thanks to a new feature rolled out over the weekend

item.title: iOS 27 Will Reportedly Just Be Bug Fixes for iOS 26
item.description: Apple's next mobile operating system will be a slight update after a major one.
